title: No parliament powder But shot and powder for the Pope. And for all his Cardinalles, Bishops, Abbots, Fryers, Monkes; the maisters and great doctours of Sorbonne. Sent to his vn-holynesse, and them all, for a newe-yeares gift. 1609.
author: Denakol.
publisher: Printed by Thomas Purfoot, for Ieffrey Chorleton, and are to be sold at the great north dore of Paules Church,
